LanguageData.ASRG.label: Advanced Stirling Radioisotope Generator
LanguageData.ASRG.description: Produces electricity using the Stirling cycle. Will slowly heat up rooms it is placed in.
LanguageData.RTG.label: Radioisotope Thermoelectric Generator
LanguageData.RTG.description: Produces electricity from Uranium. Will slowly heat up rooms it is placed in.
